module.name: Asterisk Logfiles
module.changelog: *13.0.10.3* FREEPBX-15162 *13.0.10.2* FREEPBX-13341 Logfile settings not written correctly *13.0.10.1* FREEPBX-13293 Validate data is NOT empty *13.0.10* FREEPBX-12181 Change verbose dropdown to be in line with asterisk docs *13.0.9* FREEPBX-11785 Add PCRE Filtering to log page *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11578 Add js and server validation *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10831 *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10831 FREEPBX-10922 *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.4* FREEPBX-8790 Log verbosity level *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9747 Changes made to Logfile Settings in GUI dont get submitted *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Visuals for log settings *13.0.1alpha1* Visual fixes and styling changes *12.0.6* FREEPBX-7375 missing ? on insert *12.0.5* More tweaks to color *12.0.4* FREEPBX-7339 For the ampersand *12.0.3* FREEPBX-7250 Completely re design how log files looks. *12.0.2* Realign labels. They need to be AFTER the element to work with what we are doing *12.0.1* FreePBX12 Update *2.11.0.9* #7200 Solve The case of the missing logfiles. *2.11.0.7* #7014 fixes back array population *2.11.0.6* Fix fatal error on install because of improperly set variables *2.11.0.5* #6982 Add security message and fix tooltips, courtesy of Xorcom *2.11.0.4* Missing Files fix *2.11.0.3* #6548 Fix highlighting links in navigation *2.11.0.2* #6675 checked against incorrect link *2.11.0.1* #6675 *2.11.0.0* added ability to view all logfiles *2.10.0.13* re #1317 - remove debug *2.10.0.12* re #1317 - move settings page to settings catagory; fix opts saving/display inconsistancies *2.10.0.11* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.11 *2.10.0.10* re #1143, #1122 - *2.10.0.9* re #1122 -
